title: Introduction to C
details: Learn the basics of C programming language, including variables, loops.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
details: Explore the fundamental concepts of algorithms and algorithmic design

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
details: Learn C++ programming and its applications in data structures and algorithms.

title: Basic Data Structures
details: Learn the fundamentals of data structures like arrays, linked lists, and stacks.

title: OOP in Python
details: Learn the principles of OOP and how to apply them in Python programming.

title: Software Engineering
details: Master the principles and practices of software engineering, including design.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
details: Learn cloud computing fundamentals and how to use AWS for cloud solutions.

title: Database (MySQL)
details: Learn the fundamentals of database management and SQL using MySQL.

title: Problem-Solving Part
details: Enhance your problem-solving skills and critical thinking abilities on this Course.
